name: Costs
text:
In an action under this chapter, court costs and fees as set by law may be allowed to the prevailing party. [L 1957, c 312, pt of §1; Supp, §245A-9; HRS ; am L 1972, c 164, §2(c); am L 1979, c 152, §3]
Case Notes
  This section and section 662-12 not inconsistent as to attorney's fees.  51 H. 540, 465 P.2d 580.
Hawaii Legal Reporter Citations
  Awarded.  77-1 HLR 77-267; 80-2 HLR 800964.
